subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of inter-sectoral and regional entities to formulate and implement policies and strategies aimed at addressing the development impacts of pandemics, including the gender dimensions; 2)  An enabled policy and institutional framework for effective home-based care.
subproject.description:
The Programme aims to support and strengthen the HIV/AIDS response efforts of regional economic institutions and national partners through UNDP country offices.  The programme will refocus UNDP efforts to deliver on this mandate through the new three service lines and an emerging priority area:
1. HIV/AIDS and Human Development
2. Governance of the HIV/AIDS response
3. Human rights, gender and HIV/AIDS
4. An emerging priority area, making the money work will also be fully incorporated into the project.
The total commitment from SIDA is USD$5,298,913 – USD$2,581,522 for 2006 and USD $2,717,391 for 2007, to be spent over a 2 year period.
subproject.title: RAF/06/001-HIV&AIDS Prog-SIDA

title: RAF/06/001- HIV & AIDS Programme, Sub-Saharan Africa
